name: Santa's Revenge
description:
Santa's Revenge - Created by Greg Belasco

You play as a disgruntled Santa Claus and your goal is to collect all the presents from the underserving children of the town that have found themselves on the naughty list. During your adventure  trying to re-acquire gifts, entitled children will attempt to attack you and prevent your mission. You must fight back with lumps of coal! You have successfully completed your missions when all the gifts have been collected and you escape to your sleigh.
